member.name: T:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode
member.summary: Specifies the behavior to use when writing to a bounded channel that is already full.

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.DropNewest
member.summary: Removes and ignores the newest item in the channel in order to make room for the item being written.

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.DropOldest
member.summary: Removes and ignores the oldest item in the channel in order to make room for the item being written.

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.DropWrite
member.summary: Drops the item being written.

member.name: F:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelFullMode.Wait
member.summary: Waits for space to be available in order to complete the write operation.

member.name: T:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions
member.summary: Provides options that control the behavior of bounded instances.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes the options.
member.param: The maximum number of items the bounded channel may store.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions.Capacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items the bounded channel may store.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.BoundedChannelOptions.FullMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the behavior incurred by write operations when the channel is full.

Delegate that will be called when item is being dropped from channel. See .

member.name: T:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions
member.summary: Provides options that control the behavior of channel instances.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions.AllowSynchronousContinuations
member.summary: if operations performed on a channel may synchronously invoke continuations subscribed to notifications of pending async operations; if all continuations should be invoked asynchronously.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions.SingleReader
member.summary: readers from the channel guarantee that there will only ever be at most one read operation at a time; if no such constraint is guaranteed.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelOptions.SingleWriter
member.summary: if writers to the channel guarantee that there will only ever be at most one write operation at a time; if no such constraint is guaranteed.

member.summary: Provides a base class for reading from a channel.
member.typeparam: Specifies the type of data that may be read from the channel.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.ReadAllAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates an that enables reading all of the data from the channel.
member.param: The cancellation token to use to cancel the enumeration. If data is immediately ready for reading, then that data may be yielded even after cancellation has been requested.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.ReadAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads an item from the channel.
member.param: A used to cancel the read operation.
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous read operation.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.TryPeek(`0@)
member.summary: Attempts to peek at an item from the channel.
member.param: The peeked item, or a default value if no item could be peeked.
member.returns: if an item was read; otherwise, .

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.TryRead(`0@)
member.summary: Attempts to read an item from the channel.
member.param: The read item, or a default value if no item could be read.
member.returns: if an item was read; otherwise, .

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.WaitToReadAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a that will complete when data is available to read.
member.param: A used to cancel the wait operation.

returns.para: A that will complete with a result when data is available to read or with a result when no further data will ever be available to be read due to the channel completing successfully.
If the channel completes with an exception, the task will also complete with an exception.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.CanCount
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether is available for use on this instance.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.CanPeek
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether is available for use on this instance.
member.returns: if peeking is supported by this channel instance; otherwise.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.Completion
member.summary: Gets a that completes when no more data will ever be available to be read from this channel.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the current number of items available from this channel reader.
member.exception: Counting is not supported on this instance.

member.summary: Provides a base class for writing to a channel.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

member.summary: Mark the channel as being complete, meaning no more items will be written to it.
member.param: Optional Exception indicating a failure that's causing the channel to complete.
member.exception: The channel has already been marked as complete.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1.TryComplete(System.Exception)
member.summary: Attempts to mark the channel as being completed, meaning no more data will be written to it.
member.param: An indicating the failure causing no more data to be written, or null for success.

member.summary: Attempts to write the specified item to the channel.

member.returns: if the item was written; otherwise, .

member.name: M:System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter`1.WaitToWriteAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a that will complete when space is available to write an item.
member.param: A used to cancel the wait operation.
member.returns: A that will complete with a result when space is available to write an item or with a result when no further writing will be permitted.

member.summary: Asynchronously writes an item to the channel.

member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous write operation.
